text: kraoyomk nowpel del krohthnak ban bietbien mnoussaalok ke ban buongsuong som pi yeung . banteabmk nowpel del yeung ban bratan aoy ke nouv nie k meat pi yeung vinh noh ke bercha niyeay tha tampit ke ban phdal vea aoy khnhom ku daoysaarte karchehdoeng robsakhnhom bonnaoh . phtoytowvinh vea kuchea karsaakalbong muoy kabonde puokke pheakochraen mindoeng laey
